author: matz-e
body:
Switch the output energy of HCAL TPs to a homogeneous baseline of 1/2 GeV LSB. The trigger-internal LSB is changed to 1/8 or 1/16 GeV LSB, depending on QIE-type of the inputs, to maximize dynamic range and accuracy.

This PR will need a new GT with metadata conditions to adjust energy thresholds, and new L1 calibrations once new RelVal samples are generated.
title: [HCAL] Switch to linear LUTs for 2018 TPs
